seo.title: Privacy Policy - {{appName}}
seo.description: Learn how {{appName}} collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At {{appName}}, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.description: We collect information that you provide directly to us:
items: Payment information (processed securely by our payment provider)

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.description: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process transactions and send related information
Send technical notices, updates, and support messages
Respond to your comments, questions, and requests
Monitor and analyze usage patterns and trends

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. API keys are encrypted at rest, and all data is transmitted over secure connections.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. You can request deletion of your account and associated data at any time.

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Export your data in a portable format

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use essential cookies to maintain your session and preferences. We do not use third-party tracking cookies for advertising purposes.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
